item.title: Next Level At
item.dc:creator: @Tepaz Tepaz
item.description:
@Tepaz wrote:

I increased level cap in my server to 110. However I noticed that the "Next Level at: " part only went up to level 100 (default). I tried increasing that to go to level 110 aswell. I ended up in this situation.

As you can see, now it shows that the next level is at 0 xp. No matter what level the skill is. I edited mudclient.java (see below)

edited: i3 < 98 to i3 < 109

[code] if (k1 != -1) {
gameGraphics.drawString(skillArrayLong[k1] + " skill", i + 5, i1, 1, 0xffff00);
i1 += 12;
int k2 = experienceArray[0];
for (int i3 = 0; i3 < 109; i3++)
if (playerStatExperience[k1] >= experienceArray[i3])
k2 = experienceArray[i3 + 1];

            gameGraphics.drawString("Total xp: " + playerStatExperience[k1], i + 5, i1, 1, 0xffffff);
            i1 += 12;
            gameGraphics.drawString("Next level at: " + k2, i + 5, i1, 1, 0xffffff);
            i1 += 12;[/code]

int from 99 to 110

experienceArray = new int[110];

Here is my experienceArray from Formulae.Java

public static final int[] experienceArray = {83, 174, 276, 388, 512, 650, 801, 969, 1154, 1358, 1584, 1833, 2107, 2411, 2746, 3115, 3523, 3973, 4470, 5018, 5624, 6291, 7028, 7842, 8740, 9730, 10824, 12031, 13363, 14833, 16456, 18247, 20224, 22406, 24815, 27473, 30408, 33648, 37224, 41171, 45529, 50339, 55649, 61512, 67983, 75127, 83014, 91721, 101333, 111945, 123660, 136594, 150872, 166636, 184040, 203254, 224466, 247886, 273742, 302288, 333804, 368599, 407015, 449428, 496254, 547953, 605032, 668051, 737627, 814445, 899257, 992895, 1096278, 1210421, 1336443, 1475581, 1629200, 1798808, 1986068, 2192818, 2421087, 2673114,2951373, 3258594, 3597792, 3972294, 4385776, 4842295, 5346332, 5902831, 6517253, 7195629, 7944614, 8771558, 9684577, 10692629, 11805606, 13034431, 14391160, 15889109, 17542976, 19368992, 21385073, 23611006, 26068632, 28782069, 31777943, 35085654, 40000000};

I’m out of ideas here. As you might see im really new to this. So any help would greatly be appreciated. Thanks in advance!
